title: This still isn't fixed?
body:
Almost all of the time after a game ends whether we win or lose I press Continue and the results don't popup the entire client just closes nothing else. I found a thread from 2013 with the same problem

http://forums.na.leagueoflegends.com/board/showthread.php?t=3410107

replies.body:
When your client is closing immediately after a game, it's an indication that your connection to the servers is running into issues. I recommend you run through the steps on our [Connection troubleshooting guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to prevent this from happening in the future. 

If you still have issues, please let me know.
